response.en:
Greencarddiary (Pty) Ltd is a 100% manufacturing industry in Botswana specializing in:
‚Ä¢ Lever Arch Files, Diaries, Pyramid Calendars
‚Ä¢ Sketch pads, Exam pads, Photo Books
‚Ä¢ Branded Paper Bags, Graduation Scroll Holders
‚Ä¢ Register Books, Restaurant Menus, Receipt Books
‚Ä¢ Business Cards and Bibles

We started in 2000 as an advertising agency and transitioned to manufacturing in 2011-2012. We now have 35+ staff and export to multiple African countries.
response.tn:
Greencarddiary (Pty) Ltd ke indaseteri ya go dira dilo e e 100% kwa Botswana e e itseng ka:
‚Ä¢ Mafaele a Lever Arch, Dipuku, Dikhalendara tsa Piramide
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa go sketcha, dipuku tsa ditlhahlobo, Dipuku tsa Difoto
‚Ä¢ Diposete tse di nang le brand, Dihouldara tsa dikwarata tsa graduation
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa go kwala, Menyu ya maresterante, Dipuku tsa dirisiti
‚Ä¢ Dikarete tsa kgwebo le Dibaibele

Re simolotse ka 2000 e le agentsi ya go ikgaketsa mme re fetogile go dira dilo ka 2011-2012. Jaanong re na le baseberi ba ba fetang 35 mme re romela dikonego kwa dinageng di le dintsi tsa Aforika.
response.sn:
Greencarddiary (Pty) Ltd iindasitiri yekugadzira 100% muBotswana inonyanya:
‚Ä¢ Mafaera eLever Arch, Madhayari, Makarenda ePiramidhi
‚Ä¢ Sketch pads, Exam pads, Mabhuku emifananidzo
‚Ä¢ Mabhegi emapepa ane mabhureki, Zvibato zvezvikwata zvekupedza kudzidza
‚Ä¢ Mabhuku ekunyoresa, Mamenu emaresitorendi, Mabhuku ekutambira
‚Ä¢ Makadhi ebhizinesi neBhaibheri

Takatanga muna 2000 sesangano rekushambadzira uye takachinja kuita kugadzira muna 2011-2012. Iye tine vashandi vanopfuura makumi matatu nevashanu uye tinotumira kunze kwenyika kunyika dzakawanda dzeAfrica.

response.en:
Our calendars feature creative designs and are available in different sizes:
‚Ä¢ Wide variety of design templates
‚Ä¢ Gloss lamination for durability
‚Ä¢ Public holidays for 14 African countries listed
‚Ä¢ Advertising space for users and visitors
‚Ä¢ Highly durable Wiro binding
‚Ä¢ Portable, trendy and easy to use
‚Ä¢ Strong rigid pyramid stand
‚Ä¢ Fully customized options available

Perfect for corporate gifts and promotions!
response.tn:
Dikhalendara tsa rona di na le mekgwa e meint≈°i ya disaine mme di wanala ka disaize di farologaneng:
‚Ä¢ Mekgwa e meint≈°i ya dithempleite tsa disaine
‚Ä¢ Lamination ya gloss bakeng sa go nonofala
‚Ä¢ Mat≈°at≈°i a phomolo a dit≈°haba tse 14 tsa Aforika di kwadilwe
‚Ä¢ Lefelo la go ikgaketsa bakeng sa badiri le baeti
‚Ä¢ Go bopa ga Wiro go nonofile thata
‚Ä¢ Go rwalwa go bonolo, go ya ka mekgwa le go dirisa go bonolo
‚Ä¢ Seteite ya piramide e e nonofileng
‚Ä¢ Dikgetho tse di beilweng ka botlalo di wanala

E maleba thata bakeng sa dimpho tsa dikhampani le ditiro tsa go ikgaketsa!
response.sn:
Makarenda edu ane magadzirirwo ekugadzira uye anowanikwa nemasaizi akasiyana:
‚Ä¢ Yakasiyana-siyana yematemplate ekugadzira
‚Ä¢ Gloss lamination yekusimba
‚Ä¢ Mazororo eruzhinji enyika gumi neina dzeAfrica akanyorwa
‚Ä¢ Nzvimbo yekushambadzira yevashandisi nevashanyi
‚Ä¢ Yakasimba kwazvo Wiro inosunga
‚Ä¢ Inotakurika, ine fashoni uye iri nyore kushandisa
‚Ä¢ Yakasimba rigid pyramid stand
‚Ä¢ Yakazara sarudzo dzakagadziridzwa dzinawanikwa

Yakanyatso kukodzera zvipo zvemakambani uye kukwidziridzwa!

response.en:
We specialize in custom orders with low minimum quantities:
‚Ä¢ Minimum order of just 20 units for most products
‚Ä¢ Wide range of customization options available
‚Ä¢ Your logo, colors, and branding incorporated
‚Ä¢ Various binding and finishing options
‚Ä¢ Multiple paper types and weights available
‚Ä¢ Expert design assistance if needed

Make your brand stand out with our custom products!
response.tn:
Re itsise ka di-order tse di beilweng tse di nang le palo e e kwa tlase:
‚Ä¢ Order e e kwa tlase ya diyuniti tse 20 fela bakeng sa dilo di le dintsi
‚Ä¢ Dikgetho tse di farologaneng tsa go ipeola di wanala
‚Ä¢ Logo ya lona, mmala, le brand di akarediwa
‚Ä¢ Dikgetho tse di farologaneng tsa go bopa le go fetsa
‚Ä¢ Mefuta e le mentsi ya pampiri le boima bo wanala
‚Ä¢ Thuso ya disaine ya baitseane fa go tlhokega

Dirang gore brand ya lona e gakgamale ka dilo tsa rona tse di beilweng!
response.sn:
Isu tinonyanya kugadzira maodha akasarudzika ane huwandu hwakaderera hwepazasi:
‚Ä¢ Odha shoma yemayuniti makumi maviri chete yezvigadzirwa zvakawanda
‚Ä¢ Huwandu hwakawanda hwesarudzo dzekugadziridza dzinawanikwa
‚Ä¢ Logo yako, mavara, uye branding zvakabatanidzwa
‚Ä¢ Sarudzo dzakasiyana dzekusunga uye kupedzisa
‚Ä¢ Mhando dzakawanda dzemapepa uye huremu hunowanikwa
‚Ä¢ Nyanzvi yekugadzira rubatsiro kana uchida

Ita kuti brand yako isimuke nezvigadzirwa zvedu zvakasarudzika!

response.en:
We offer delivery and export services:
‚Ä¢ Local delivery within Botswana
‚Ä¢ Export to Zimbabwe, Zambia, South Africa, Namibia
‚Ä¢ SADC FTA accredited for duty-free exports to Zimbabwe
‚Ä¢ Reliable courier services
‚Ä¢ Tracking available for shipments

Contact us for specific delivery options and costs! üöö
response.tn:
Re tlamela ka ditirelo tsa kabo le go romela konego kwa ntle:
‚Ä¢ Kabo ya selegae mo Botswana
‚Ä¢ Go romela konego kwa Zimbabwe, Zambia, Aforika Borwa, Namibia
‚Ä¢ Re dumalantswe ke SADC FTA bakeng sa go romela konego kwa Zimbabwe ntle le madi
‚Ä¢ Ditirelo tsa courier tse di ikanyegang
‚Ä¢ Go latela konego di wanala

Re letsetse go dikgakololo tse di tlhamaletseng tsa kabo le ditshenyo! üöö
response.sn:
Tinopa masevhisi ekuendesa uye ekutumira kunze kwenyika:
‚Ä¢ Kuendesa kwenzvimbo mukati meBotswana
‚Ä¢ Kutumira kunze kwenyika kuZimbabwe, Zambia, South Africa, Namibia
‚Ä¢ SADC FTA yakasimbiswa yekutumira kunze kwenyika zvisina mutero kuZimbabwe
‚Ä¢ Masevhisi ekuvimbika eCourier
‚Ä¢ Kuteedzera kunowanikwa kune zvinotumirwa

Tibate kuti tiwane sarudzo dzakananga dzekuendesa uye mutengo! üöö

response.en:
Our diaries come in various sizes (A4, A5, Slimline/A6) and binding options:
‚Ä¢ Casebound, Perfect Bound, Wiro-Bound
‚Ä¢ Concealed Wiro-Bound, Ring-Bound

Customization options include:
‚Ä¢ Leather finish in various colors
‚Ä¢ Cover design patterns
‚Ä¢ Front end-sheet customization
‚Ä¢ Client information lead-in pages
‚Ä¢ Section wrap around with client info
‚Ä¢ Silver, gold or blind embossing of logo
‚Ä¢ Single, two, three and 4 panel cover options
‚Ä¢ Square back, round spine and flexible cover
‚Ä¢ Gilt or Nickel corner clips, round corners
‚Ä¢ Personalization with names

We also offer hybrid diaries with QR code integration!
response.tn:
Dipuku tsa rona di tla ka disaize di farologanyeng (A4, A5, Slimline/A6) le dikgetho tsa go bopa:
‚Ä¢ Casebound, Perfect Bound, Wiro-Bound
‚Ä¢ Concealed Wiro-Bound, Ring-Bound

Dikgetho tsa go ipeola di akaretsa:
‚Ä¢ Lefelo la letlalo ka mmala o o farologaneng
‚Ä¢ Mekgwa ya disaine ya dikhava
‚Ä¢ Go ipeola ga letlapele la khavare
‚Ä¢ Matlakana a tshedimosetso ya moreki
‚Ä¢ Karolo e e potolotseng tshedimosetso ya moreki
‚Ä¢ Go embossa logo ka selefera, gouta kgotsa go se bonale
‚Ä¢ Dikgetho tsa dikhava tsa panel e le nngwe, pedi, tharo kgotsa nne
‚Ä¢ Mokwatla o o sekwere, mokwatla o o potologang le khavare e e flexibole
‚Ä¢ Diklipi tsa konere tsa gilt kgotsa Nickel, dikhona tse di potologang
‚Ä¢ Go bewa ga maina

Re tlamela ka dipuku tsa hybrid tse di nang le go kopanya khoutu ya QR!
response.sn:
Madhayari edu anouya nemasaizi akasiyana (A4, A5, Slimline/A6) uye sarudzo dzekusunga:
‚Ä¢ Casebound, Perfect Bound, Wiro-Bound
‚Ä¢ Concealed Wiro-Bound, Ring-Bound

Sarudzo dzekugadziridza dzinosanganisira:
‚Ä¢ Kupedzisa kweganda mumavara akasiyana
‚Ä¢ Mapatani ekugadzira mabutiro
‚Ä¢ Kugadziridzwa kwepepa rekupedzisira kwekumberi
‚Ä¢ Mapeji ekutungamira ruzivo rwevatengi
‚Ä¢ Chikamu chakatenderedza neruzivo rwevatengi
‚Ä¢ Sirivheri, goridhe kana blind embossing yelogo
‚Ä¢ Imwe, mbiri, matatu uye 4 panel sarudzo dzebhutiro
‚Ä¢ Square back, round spine uye flexible cover
‚Ä¢ Gilt kana Nickel korona makipi, makona akatenderedza
‚Ä¢ Kugadziridzwa nemazita

Tinopawo madhayari ehybrid ane QR code integration!

response.en: Goodbye! Thank you for chatting with Greencarddiary. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need help with custom diaries or stationery products. Have a wonderful day! üëã
response.tn: Tsamaya sentle! Ke lebogile gore o buile le Greencarddiary. Ikutlwe o gololesegile go re letsetsa nako nngwe le nngwe fa o tlhoka thuso ka dipuku tse di beilweng kgotsa dilo tsa ofisi. Nna le letsatsi le lentle! üëã
response.sn: Sara mushe! Ndatenda nekutaura neGreencarddiary. Inzwa wakasununguka kubata nesu chero nguva kana uchida rubatsiro nemadhayari akasarudzika kana zvigadzirwa zvemumabasa. Iva nezuva rakanaka! üëã

response.en: Hello! Welcome to Greencarddiary. We specialize in custom diaries, calendars, and stationery products. How can I assist you today? üòä
response.tn: Dumela! O amogelwe ko Greencarddiary. Re itsise ka go dira dipuku tse di beilweng, dikhalendara, le dilo tsa ofisi. Nka go thusa jang gompieno? üòä
response.sn: Mhoro! Tigamuchirwe kuGreencarddiary. Isu tinonyanya kugadzira madhayari akasarudzika, makarenda, uye zvigadzirwa zvepamabasa. Ndingakubatsire sei nhasi? üòä

response.en: I'm doing great, thank you for asking! I'm here and ready to help you with any questions about our custom diaries, calendars, or other stationery products. How are you doing today? üòä
response.tn: Ke siame, ke lebogile gore o botsa! Ke mo mafaratlheng mme ke ipaakantse go go thusa ka dipotso dipe fela tsa dipuku tsa rona tse di beilweng, dikhalendara, kgotsa dilo tse dingwe tsa ofisi. O kae gompieno? üòä
response.sn: Ndiri mushanda zvakanaka, ndatenda nekubvunza! Ndiri pano uye ndakagadzirira kukubatsira nemibvunzo yese pamusoro pemadhayari edu akasarudzika, makarenda, kana zvimwe zvigadzirwa zvemumabasa. Wakadii nhasi? üòä

response.en:
Our Lever Arch Files feature:
‚Ä¢ Made of various material mixes and colors
‚Ä¢ Matt or Gloss laminated on both sides
‚Ä¢ Attractive 2 colour printing
‚Ä¢ Rado file locking system
‚Ä¢ Sturdy and durable (2000-micron European grey board)
‚Ä¢ File sizes ranging from A5 to A3
‚Ä¢ Fully recyclable and environmentally friendly

Perfect for office organization and document storage!
response.tn:
Mafaele a rona a Lever Arch a na le:
‚Ä¢ A dirilwe ka didirisiwa le mmala o o farologaneng
‚Ä¢ Matt kgotsa Gloss laminated ka mabaka a mabedi
‚Ä¢ Go gatisa ga mmala o mebedi o o kgabisang
‚Ä¢ Tsamaiso ya go tswala mafaele ya Rado
‚Ä¢ Go nonofala le go nonofala (2000-micron European grey board)
‚Ä¢ Disaize tsa faiele go tswa ko A5 go ya ko A3
‚Ä¢ Go kgonwa go di dirisa gape ka botlalo le go sireletsa tikologo

Tse di malebang thata bakeng sa go rulaganya ofisi le go boloka ditokomane!
response.sn:
Mafaera edu eLever Arch ane:
‚Ä¢ Akagadzirwa nemidziyo yakasiyana-siyana uye mavara
‚Ä¢ Matt kana Gloss yakaputirwa kumativi ese
‚Ä¢ Inodhinda ine mavara maviri anoyevedza
‚Ä¢ Rado file locking system
‚Ä¢ Yakasimba uye yakasimba (2000-micron European grey board)
‚Ä¢ Saizi dzemafaera kubva paA5 kusvika paA3
‚Ä¢ Inogona kudzokororwa zvizere uye ine hushamwari kwezvakatipoteredza

Yakanyatso kukodzera kurongeka kwemahofisi uye kuchengetedza zvinyorwa!

response.en:
Our custom branded paper bags are:
‚Ä¢ Printed and laminated on 200 gsm glossy paper
‚Ä¢ Available in different sizes (A4, A5 or custom sizes)
‚Ä¢ Fully customized design to suit your needs
‚Ä¢ Black & White on Kraft Paper options
‚Ä¢ Ideal for packaging gifts for employees, customers and stakeholders

Great for corporate gifting and brand visibility!
response.tn:
Diposete tsa rona tse di nang le brand ke:
‚Ä¢ Di gatisiwa di bo di laminwa mo pampiring ya 200 gsm glossy
‚Ä¢ Di wanala ka disaize di farologaneng (A4, A5 kgotsa disaize tse di beilweng)
‚Ä¢ Disaine e e beilweng ka botlalo go go direla
‚Ä¢ Dikgetho tsa Black & White mo Kraft Paper
‚Ä¢ Tse di malebang thata bakeng sa go phuthegela dimpho tsa baseberi, bareki le ba ba amegang

Tse di molemolelang thata bakeng sa go nea dimpho tsa dikhampani le go bonala ga brand!
response.sn:
Mabhegi edu emapepa ane mabhureki akasarudzika:
‚Ä¢ Akadhindwa uye akaputirwa pa200 gsm glossy paper
‚Ä¢ Anowanikwa nemasaizi akasiyana (A4, A5 kana saizi dzakasarudzika)
‚Ä¢ Dhizaini yakanyatso gadziridzwa kuti ienderane nezvaunoda
‚Ä¢ Black & White paKraft Paper sarudzo
‚Ä¢ Yakanakira kurongedza zvipo zvevashandi, vatengi uye vanobatanidzwa

Yakanakira kupa zvipo zvemakambani uye kuonekwa kwemhando!

response.en:
Our pricing varies based on the products, customization, and quantity. We offer:
‚Ä¢ Competitive pricing for all products
‚Ä¢ Quantity discounts available
‚Ä¢ Customization affects final price
‚Ä¢ Export pricing for international orders

Contact us for a personalized quote based on your specific needs! üí∞
response.tn:
Ditlhwatlhwa tsa rona di farologana go ya ka dilo, go ipeola, le palo. Re tlamela ka:
‚Ä¢ Ditlhwatlhwa tse di kgonang go phadisanya bakeng sa dilo tsotlhe
‚Ä¢ Bonnye jwa palo bo wanala
‚Ä¢ Go ipeola go ama ditlhwatlhwa tsa bofelo
‚Ä¢ Ditlhwatlhwa tsa go romela konego kwa ntle

Re letsetse go go naya tekanyetso e e beilweng go ya ka dithata tsa lona! üí∞
response.sn:
Mitengo yedu inosiyana zvichienderana nezvigadzirwa, kugadziridzwa, uye huwandu. Tinopa:
‚Ä¢ Mitengo inokwikwidza yezvigadzirwa zvese
‚Ä¢ Mitengo yekuderera inawanikwa
‚Ä¢ Kugadziridzwa kunokanganisa mutengo wekupedzisira
‚Ä¢ Mitengo yekutumira kunze kwenyika yemaodha epasi rose

Tibate kuti tiwane quote yakagadzirirwa zvinoenderana nezvaunoda! üí∞

response.en:
We offer a wide range of products including:
‚Ä¢ Custom corporate diaries (A4, A5, A6 sizes)
‚Ä¢ Printed & laminated diaries with QR code options
‚Ä¢ Executive diary organizers (Filofax style)
‚Ä¢ Custom calendars with creative designs
‚Ä¢ Branded paper bags (200 gsm glossy)
‚Ä¢ Lever arch files (A5 to A3 sizes)
‚Ä¢ Register books (A3/A4, 200 pages)
‚Ä¢ Photo albums with premium paper
‚Ä¢ NCR books (duplicate, triplicate, quadruplicate)
‚Ä¢ Custom school notebooks & student diaries
‚Ä¢ Graduation scroll holders
‚Ä¢ Restaurant menus
‚Ä¢ Business cards

All products can be customized to your needs!
response.tn:
Re rekisa dilo di le dintsi jaaka:
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa dikhampani tse di beilweng (A4, A5, A6)
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tse di gatiseditsweng le tse di laminetsweng di na le dikhoutu tsa QR
‚Ä¢ Baokedi ba dipuku ba baeteledipele (mokgwa wa Filofax)
‚Ä¢ Dikhalendara tse di beilweng tse di nang le mekgwa e meint≈°i
‚Ä¢ Diposete tse di nang le brand (200 gsm glossy)
‚Ä¢ Mafaele a lever arch (A5 go ya ko A3)
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa go kwala (A3/A4, matlakana a 200)
‚Ä¢ Dialebamo tsa difoto tse di nang le pampiri e e botoka
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa NCR (duplicate, triplicate, quadruplicate)
‚Ä¢ Dipuku tsa sekolo tse di beilweng le dipuku tsa barutwana
‚Ä¢ Dihouldara tsa dikwarata tsa graduation
‚Ä¢ Menyu ya maresterante
‚Ä¢ Dikarete tsa kgwebo

Dilo tsotlhe di ka dirwa go ya ka dithata tsa lona!
response.sn:
Tinopa huwandu hwakawanda hwezvigadzirwa zvinosanganisira:
‚Ä¢ Madhayari emakambani akasarudzika (saizi A4, A5, A6)
‚Ä¢ Madhayari akadhindwa & akaputirwa ane sarudzo dzeQR code
‚Ä¢ Masisitimu emadhayari evakuru (maitiro eFilofax)
‚Ä¢ Makarenda akasarudzika ane magadzirirwo ekugadzira
‚Ä¢ Mabhegi emapepa ane mabhureki (200 gsm glossy)
‚Ä¢ Mafaera eLever arch (saizi kubva A5 kusvika A3)
‚Ä¢ Mabhuku ekunyoresa (A3/A4, mapeji 200)
‚Ä¢ Maalbum emifananidzo ane mapepa epremium
‚Ä¢ Mabhuku eNCR (duplicate, triplicate, quadruplicate)
‚Ä¢ Mabhuku echikoro akasarudzika & madhayari evadzidzi
‚Ä¢ Zvibato zvezvikwata zvekupedza kudzidza
‚Ä¢ Mamenu emaresitorendi
‚Ä¢ Makadhi ebhizinesi

Zvese zvigadzirwa zvinogona kugadziridzwa kuti zvienderane nezvaunoda!

response.en: You're very welcome! I'm happy to help. If you have more questions about our products or services, feel free to ask anytime. We're here to support your branding needs! üòä
response.tn: O amogelwe thata! Ke itumetse go thusa. Fa o na le dipotso tse dingwe ka dilo kgotsa ditirelo tsa rona, ikutlwe o gololesegile go botsa nako nngwe le nngwe. Re teng go tshegetsa dithata tsa lona tsa brand! üòä
response.sn: Unogamuchirwa kwazvo! Ndinofara kukubatsira. Kana uine mimwe mibvunzo nezvezvigadzirwa zvedu kana masevhisi, inzwa wakasununguka kubvunza chero nguva. Tiri pano kutsigira zvaunoda zvebrand! üòä
